title: FIT File: Garmin Fenix 8 and Enduro 3: Let’s Chat
content:
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, we chat about the the new Garmin Fenix 8, the Enduro 3, and already some discussions on what we want in a Fenix 9 (or, Fenix 8 Pro?), and Enduro 4. Just cause that’s the way we roll. Oh, right, Fenix E too.

0:00 Epic Testing in Spain
11:13 Garmin Fenix 8
42:33 Garmin Enduro 3
1:01:13 Garmin Fenix E
1:05:29 What’s Coming Up?

Thanks to Precision Fuel & Hydration, where you can get 15% off your first order.  Additionally, check out their free Fuel & Hydration Planner.

And further thanks to The Pros Closet (TPC), where you can get $40 off an order of $200 or more with coupon code: 2024FITFILE40

And then for the audio-only version, you can find it here:

Thanks for listening!
author: Ray Maker
